description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the remote code execution vulnerability associated with libarchive (CVE-2024-26256):

1. Install the KB5036893 update on your Windows system, which covers affected builds [{10, 0, 22631, 3447}, {10, 0, 22621, 3447}].  
2. Restart your system after the installation to ensure that all changes are applied properly.

**Details**:
- This update addresses vulnerabilities related to heap-based buffer overflows and out-of-bounds writes, critical for maintaining the integrity and availability of your system. Be sure to check the full update guide available at [MSRC](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-26256) for additional information. 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a compatible Windows build mentioned above.  
- Backup any critical data before performing the update.

**Note**: User interaction may be required, such as downloading and executing the installation of the update.
